name: ribbit digits
description:
ribbit digits was made for the ChainLetterJam, in which I was nominated by droqen to make a game based on his game Dungeon Bounce 

Click and drag the numbers to keep the frog from falling, see how long you can last!

#ChainLetterJam

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 1 minute game in some way inspired by the game that nominated you.

Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (or less or more, whatever, this isn't a chain letter where you die in three days if you don't).

Previous games in this chain:

  1. https://nartier.itch.io/wordman-saves-the-day
  2. https://vimlark.itch.io/word-bounce
  3. https://niborious.itch.io/word-bounce-3d
  4. https://patrickgh3.itch.io/arithmetic-bounce
  5. https://droqen.itch.io/dungeon-bounce
  6. this one :)
